Welcome to my terminal styled portfolio website!

readme:
-------------------------------------------------------------
 About Me
-------------------------------------------------------------
 Hey there, I'm Nishant!
 Currently learning Next.js & DSA while building Fullstack projects
 and contributing to open-source.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------
 Skills & Tools
-------------------------------------------------------------
 > Languages:
 C, C++, JavaScript, TypeScript, Rust, Python, Java, HTML, CSS
 
 > Frameworks & Libraries:
 React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, TailwindCSS, Appwrite, Firebase
 
 > Databases:
 MongoDB, PostgreSQL
 
 > ML & Data Science:
 PyTorch, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, OpenCV, Anaconda
 
 > DevOps & Tools:
 Kubernetes, Docker, Git, GitHub, GitLab, Neovim, VSCode, JetBrains
